english.segment1: You should know me by now. I've always been straight with you. I've always tried to sing about the truth the way I see it, In a mixed up world where truth is. hard to find.
english.segment2: I ain't no spiritual superman. Don't always give a shiny, bright example. of what a believer ought to be.
english.segment3: I ain't never parted the ocean, though I really think I could. if I had the faith of a mustard seed, like the Bible says I should. I ain't never moved a mountain, I ain't never felt that need. But the one thing God has tought me to see..
english.segment4: I can have faith. A mountain of hope. I can even speak with tongues of angels. Tell you everyting I know. But it doesn't mean a thing in this world. Without a mighty love
english.segment5: I can be strong. I can stand tall. I can point squarely at the mountain. And command that it be gone. But it doesn't mean a thing in this world. Without a mighty love
english.segment6: I ain't standin' no mount. I'm not tryin' to preach to ya. and tell you that I've found all the easy answers. when half the time I can't even. find my keys.
english.segment7: But I feel like a regular Billy Graham. when I start talkin' bout my Jesus, and all that he's done for me.
english.segment8: Don't you know that I've received forgiveness through no. effort of my own. I've been given so much mercy, so I'll be the last to throw a stone. And I apologize, if you think that I'm coming on too strong. But there's just one thing I want you to know..
